products.name: Classic Denim Jacket
products.description: The perfect addition to your wardrobe, this classic denim jacket features a timeless design that never goes out of style. Made with high-quality denim and finished with durable hardware, it's both stylish and practical. Available in various sizes.

products.name: Flowy Maxi Dress
products.description: This flowy maxi dress is the epitome of summer style. Made with lightweight fabric and featuring a flattering silhouette, it's perfect for a day out on the town or a romantic evening out. Available in various sizes and colors.

products.name: Kids' Graphic T-Shirt
products.description: Let your little ones express their personalities with our collection of graphic T-shirts for kids. Made with soft, comfortable fabric and featuring a variety of fun designs, these shirts are perfect for everyday wear or special occasions. Available in various sizes and designs.

products.name: Cropped Trench Coat
products.description: Stay on-trend with this cropped trench coat. Featuring a modern silhouette and high-quality construction, it's the perfect addition to any outfit. Available in various sizes and colors.

products.description: Add a touch of elegance to your wardrobe with this sleeveless A-line dress. Made with soft, high-quality fabric and featuring a flattering silhouette, it's perfect for a variety of occasions. Available in various sizes and colors.

products.name: Kids' Hooded Sweatshirt
